description: I'm not a baker. But thanks to Woolworths Mud Cakes I was able to make this stress free baby shower cake for my girlfriend!
keywords: Mud Cake Hack with White Chocolate and Raspberry
name: Mud Cake Hack with White Chocolate and Raspberry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove skewers from the cake and apply a light layer of buttercream. Place cake back into the fridge for 30 mins then repeat until the desired layer or butter cream and look is achieved. Decorate and serve.
